dcterms:creator: C.-L. Hsu
J.-S. R. Jang
dcterms:description: The MIR-1K dataset consists of 1,000 song clips lasting 4 to 13 seconds with a sample rate of 16,000 Hz, recorded from 110 Chinese popular karaoke songs performed by both male and female amateurs.
dcterms:title: MIR-1K

dcterms:creator: T.-S. Chan
T.-C. Yeh
Z.-C. Fan
H.-W. Chen
L. Su
Y.-H. Yang
R. Jang
dcterms:description: The iKala dataset consists of 352 30-second song clips with a sample rate of 44,100 Hz, recorded from Chinese popular songs performed by professional singers. Only 252 song clips are released as a public subset for evaluation.
dcterms:title: iKala

dcterms:description: The DSD100 dataset is taken from a subtask called MUS from the Signal Separation Evaluation Campaign (SiSEC). It consists of Dev and Test parts each with 50 songs with a sample rate of 44,100 Hz, providing four sources: bass, drums, other, and vocals.
dcterms:title: DSD100
